snippet.name: reg_genicons
snippet.help: Registers a desktop icon for the class
snippet.starttext: <cfmodule template="/#request.SEMap#/config/init/reg_genicons.cfm" modname="$${modname}" title="$${title}" module="$${module:/#request.SEMap#/path/to/mod.cfm'}" image="$${image:/images/icons/icon.gif}" class="$${class:APPINSTANCE|APP}" perms="$${perms:READ|WRITE|ADMIN}" parentperms="$${parentperms:READ|WRITE|ADMIN}" width="$${width:600}" height="$${height:400}" tabs="$${tabs}" check="$${check}" dialog="$${dialog:yes|no}" >
